Trigger.Name: Twin Snakes Visual
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Twin Snakes from [a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+ for (?<time>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Twin Snakes Cancel
Trigger.RegularExpression: 8b0:You lose the effect of Twin Snakes.

Trigger.Name: Track duration
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<name>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Twin Snakes

Trigger.Name: RoE cancled
Trigger.RegularExpression: 8b0:You lose the effect of Riddle of Earth.

Trigger.Name: Track duration
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:.{8}:(?<player>[a-z-A-Z']+ [a-z-A-Z']+) gains the effect of Riddle Of Earth
